Download latest distributive from MicroSIP official site and unpack files to these folder.

For example, files like below:
- avcodec-57.dll
- avformat-57.dll
- avutil-55.dll
- hangup.wav
- langpack_XXXXXXXX.txt
- License.txt
- MicroSIP Website.url
- microsip.exe
- msgin.wav
- msgout.wav
- ringing2.wav
- ringing.wav
- ringtone.wav
- SDL2.dll
- swscale-4.dll
